-- input --
To test, run this command:
  golang test -more

Or, to test specific things, run this command:

golang test -more \
  -pkg first/package \
  -pkg second/package \
  -pkg third/package

Happy testing!
-- golangfmt --
To test, run this command:

	golang test -more

Or, to test specific things, run this command:

	golang test -more \
	  -pkg first/package \
	  -pkg second/package \
	  -pkg third/package

Happy testing!
-- markdown --
To test, run this command:

	golang test -more

Or, to test specific things, run this command:

	golang test -more \
	  -pkg first/package \
	  -pkg second/package \
	  -pkg third/package

Happy testing!
